input.sentences: i went to go visit a great historical building .
the leading to the building was beautiful with a well .
here i was examining the walls .
there was even a pretty garden blooming .
and there was also a tombstone for someone who passed away here .
output.sentences: I went to tour some castle grounds today.
All the scenery was so amazing.
I loved seeing the pretty arches and door ways
They even had a small garden!
A princess lived there, and by the time I left I felt like royalty.
